keywords.description: Show available keywords and what they do
Get current weather conditions and 5-day forecast
keywords.abilityText: Get current weather conditions and 5-day forecast
keywords.abilityWhen: User asks for weather/temperature/conditions/forecast for a specific place.

optional: time window (implied by keyword: current vs forecast)
abilityInputs.validation: Location must be a specific place. Prefer City, State (US) or City, Region, Country (non-US) or a 5-digit US ZIP.

keywords.abilityWhen: User asks for the upcoming forecast for a specific place.

abilityInputs.validation: Location must be specific. Prefer City, State (US) or City, Region, Country or 5-digit ZIP.

keywords.abilityWhen: User asks what it is like right now (conditions/temperature) for a specific place.

abilityInputs.validation: Location must be specific. Prefer City, State (US) or City, Region, Country or 5-digit ZIP.

keywords.description: Get an AI-powered opinionated weather report
keywords.abilityText: Get weather data and produce an AI-powered opinionated weather report
keywords.abilityWhen: User asks for a narrative/opinionated weather report for a specific place.

abilityInputs.validation: Location must be specific. Prefer City, State (US) or City, Region, Country or 5-digit ZIP.

keywords.description: Get current NFL game scores. Optionally provide a date (YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD) to look up scores for a specific date; otherwise returns the most recent scoreboard.
keywords.abilityText: Get current NFL game scores. Optionally provide a date (YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD) to look up scores for a specific date; otherwise returns the most recent scoreboard.

keywords.description: Get latest NFL news headlines. Optionally provide a filter word to narrow results (e.g. 'nfl news chiefs').
keywords.abilityText: Get latest NFL news headlines. Optionally provide a filter word to narrow results (e.g. 'nfl news chiefs').
